N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 603.1 - Adjustment by redistribution of reimbursement claims

State Regulations

When reimbursement methodologies are altered as the
result of State or Federal legislation, regulation or instructions, adjustments
to claims to reflect the revised methodologies must be submitted as instructed
by the department. Except as otherwise prescribed by the department, such
adjustments must be stated or claimed in a manner that does not adversely
affect any claim for reimbursement prepared and/or submitted to a reimbursement
source by the department. Adjustments by redistribution may be required
for: (a) certain releasees from
institutions regulated by the State Department of Mental Hygiene for which
there is no local share; (b) administration of public assistance and care for needy Indians for which there
is no local share; (c) long-term
medical assistance provided in accordance with paragraph (g) of subdivision 1
of section
368-a
of
the Social Services Law; (d) certain refugees for whom increased Federal financial participation is
available; (e) certain Home Energy

Assistance Program expenditures which may be included in other public
assistance grants; or
(f) such
other classifications as may be specified in State or Federal law, regulation
or instructions of the department. Notes
